thesis.description: This thesis explains the evolution of the criticism in Chinese on Wu Jingzi's novel The Scholars (Rulin Waishi). It discusses more than one hundred items of criticism which evolve from embryonic form in the eighteenth century and nineteenth century through the formation of literary criticism. as an increasingly institutionalized discourse in the first half of the twentieth century.
